name: Margherita Posillico
info: "Training with Jamal was one of the greatest decisions I ever made!! Jamal is extremely passionate about what he does, and has the skills to match. He is client focused and spends his time getting to know you. His knowledge on fitness, nutrition and anatomy allows him to properly address your specific needs so that you can have the optimal results. I am so thankful to have met him - he truly took my health and fitness to the next level! THANK YOU, JAMAL!"

name: Melanie Caramore
info: I came to Jamal with 5 + years of training both on my own and with another trainer.Under his tutelageI’ve gotten stronger, leaner, fitter and can honestly say I’m in the best shape of my life. He was able to guide me through a shoulder injury and keep me on track despite the limitations it placed on my ability to lift.He has the breadth of knowledge and experience to handle any client who comes to him - from those just getting started on their fitness journey to those who have been at it for years and are looking for that extra intensity and techniques to take their workouts to the next level. Personal trainers are a dime a dozen but when you find someone who can challenge you guide you and continually help to make you better great things are possible. Including great glutes !I would know.
